wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Charles Cook (born 10 August 1969) is a former professional football player, who is now the physiotherapist at National League side Eastleigh.

response: *Andy Cook (footballer, born 1969), English former professional footballer who played for Southampton, Exeter City, and Swansea City
*Andy Cook (footballer, born 1990), English professional footballer playing for Bradford City
*Andy Cook (baseball) (born 1967), American former professional baseball pitcher
*Andy Cooke (born 1974), English professional footballer who plays for Market Drayton Town
